trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element which enables <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> elements (i.e. a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"></xref>) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
trans-unit.target: 수 있도록 하는 블록 수준 유동 콘텐츠 요소 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 요소 (즉, 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Button"> </xref>)을 포함할 수 ()에서 호스트 유동 콘텐츠입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a BlockUIContainer (see example below).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>요소 (즉, 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>)는 BlockUIContainer에 포함 하 여 유동 콘텐츠에 직접 포함 될 수 있습니다 (아래 예제 참조).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: An BlockUIContainer may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: BlockUIContainer 직접 호스팅할 수 있습니다는 하나의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>자식.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an BlockUIContainer may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 자식 요소는 BlockUIContainer에서 호스트 자체의 자식을 호스팅할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새로 만든 빈 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref> class, taking a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object as the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref> 지정 된 클래스 <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 새의 초기 내용으로 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> object specifying the initial contents of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 새의 초기 콘텐츠를 지정 하는 개체 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> hosted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer"></xref>.
An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 자식 요소가 호스트 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>자체의 자식을 호스팅할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the Child property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]를 래핑하는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>에 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>를 설정 하는 것과 같습니다 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>자식 속성의 값으로.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>
